bio: I am looking for good ecosystem crypto and join in community
contributionDescription:
My contributions to the Optimism ecosystem have been diverse and multifaceted, reflecting my enthusiasm and passion for this innovative blockchain technology. I am excited to share the following contributions for which I wish to receive RetroPGF.

Voting and Governance: I have been actively involved in the governance process of the Optimism ecosystem, exercising my right to vote on crucial proposals and decisions that impact the future of the network. My participation in governance ensures that the community's voice is heard and fosters a decentralized and democratic decision-making process.
impactDescription:
i'm 2 times join to vote in Optimism Collective, and using small data i keep suppot this project. because sometimes in bull run i trust. Optism can doing great move in that section. with Optimism i trust. let's for small to bigger data in Optimism
In summary, my contributions to the Optimism ecosystem span active participation, governance, spreading awareness, providing feedback, and supporting new projects. I am proud to be a part of this thriving community and look forward to receiving RetroPGF as a recognition of my efforts.
pwCategorySuggestions: Governance & Tokens, Community Building, Web3 Community Platform
